mapper.select: SELECT w.order_id, w.plan_id, w.mgr_id, w.equip_id, w.start_date, w.end_date, w.status, w.quantity, w.defect_quantity, e.name AS emp_name, q.name AS equipment_name FROM workOrder w INNER JOIN emp e ON w.mgr_id = e.user_id INNER JOIN equipment q ON w.equip_id = q.equip_id ORDER BY w.order_id ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO plan (order_id, plan_id, mgr_id, equip_id, start_date, end_date, status, quantity, defect_quantity) VALUES (#{order_id}, #{plan_id}, #{mgr_id}, #{equip_id}, TO_DATE(#{start_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{end_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{status}, #{quantity}, #{defect_quantity})
